1.0.1.name: wordpress/codium-extend
1.0.1.description: Codium Extend is a very simple wordpress theme with all the new features in Wordpress 3.4: personalized menus, choosing a color for the background, ready for translation, custom header image ... This theme is ideal for anyone seeking simplicity with the full articles on the homepage! Bonus : this theme is optimized for handheld and mobile devices (iphone, ipad, and smartphone) with a responsive design. Un thème disponible en français aussi!
